name: 逃出空间
description:
This is a game with a short plot but full of fantastic ideas. When you are alone, you can play alone. When you are with friends, you can also cooperate with them to pass the test. When you experience the game, you can feel it. The main way to play the game is to find the secret leading to the opposite door.



The game has a great deal of fresh decryption elements. Players solve puzzles through their own inference analysis and learn to think.

This game is still a single player game at this stage, but in the future development, it will further realize the dual player playing method.



Game Features

Rich single player games: next-generation game content and short storylines.

Advanced Object System: Creates a game style that has never been seen before, bringing challenging game content.

Original music.
